{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Social Media Manager",
  "description": "KloudOpp Limited is a new early-stage educational technology (EdTech) and Service Provider startup based on an ambitious &amp; exciting, yet realistic product vision.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Social Media Manager&nbsp;

Job Location:&nbsp;Lekki, Lagos&nbsp;
Employment Type: Full-time

About the Role


	Kloudopp Limited is looking for a creative and results-driven Social Media Manager with strong graphics design skills to manage, grow, and position our digital presence across multiple platforms.


Key Responsibilities


	Plan, create, and manage daily social media content (text + visuals)
	Design high-quality graphics for posts, campaigns, and announcements
	Manage platforms including LinkedIn, Instagram, Twitter/X, Tiktok and Facebook
	Develop and execute monthly content calendars
	Grow audience engagement, reach, and brand visibility
	Track performance using analytics and optimize content strategy
	Collaborate with marketing, product, and leadership teams


Required Skills &amp; Experience


	Proven experience as a Social Media Manager or Digital Content Manager
	Strong graphics design skills (Canva, Figma, Adobe tools, etc.)
	Excellent copywriting and storytelling skills
	Good understanding of social media trends and algorithms
	Ability to work independently and meet deadlines
	Experience with tech, education, or startup brands is a plus.


What We Offer


	Competitive monthly salary of N200,000
	Opportunity to work with a fast-growing tech company
	Creative freedom and ownership of brand voice
	Remote-friendly work environment
	Career growth and long-term opportunities


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their&nbsp;CV,&nbsp;Portfolio or sample social media pages link and&nbsp;Cover Letter to:&nbsp;careers@kloudopp.com&nbsp;using &quot;Social Media Manager Application&quot;&nbsp;as the subject of the email.",
  "datePosted": "2026-01-30",
  "validThrough": "2026-02-15",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",
  "hiringOrganization": {
    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "KloudOpp"
    
  },
  "jobLocation": {
    "@type": "Place",
    "address": {
      "@type": "PostalAddress",
       "postalCode": ". ",
       "addressRegion": ". ",
       "streetAddress": ". ",
      "addressLocality": "Lagos",
      "addressCountry": "NG"
     
      
    }
  },
  "identifier": {
    "@type": "PropertyValue",
    "name": "",
    "value": "193833"
  },
  "baseSalary": {
    "@type": "MonetaryAmount",
    "currency": "NGN",

      "@type": "QuantitativeValue",
      "minValue": 150000,
      "maxValue": 250000,
      "unitText": "MONTH"
    }
  }
}



Social Media Manager Job at KloudOpp Limited




        
    

        
        KloudOpp Limited is a new early-stage educational technology (EdTech) and Service Provider startup based on an ambitious & exciting, yet realistic product vision.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Social Media Manager 

Job Location: Lekki, Lagos 
Employment Type: Full-time

About the Role


	Kloudopp Limited is looking for a creative and results-driven Social Media Manager with strong graphics design skills to manage, grow, and position our digital presence across multiple platforms.


Key Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Plan, create, and manage daily social media content (text + visuals)
	Design high-quality graphics for posts, campaigns, and announcements
	Manage platforms including LinkedIn, Instagram, Twitter/X, Tiktok and Facebook
	Develop and execute monthly content calendars
	Grow audience engagement, reach, and brand visibility
	Track performance using analytics and optimize content strategy
	Collaborate with marketing, product, and leadership teams


Required Skills & Experience


	Proven experience as a Social Media Manager or Digital Content Manager
	Strong graphics design skills (Canva, Figma, Adobe tools, etc.)
	Excellent copywriting and storytelling skills
	Good understanding of social media trends and algorithms
	Ability to work independently and meet deadlines
	Experience with tech, education, or startup brands is a plus.


What We Offer


	Competitive monthly salary of N200,000
	Opportunity to work with a fast-growing tech company
	Creative freedom and ownership of brand voice
	Remote-friendly work environment
	Career growth and long-term opportunities


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV, Portfolio or sample social media pages link and Cover Letter to: careers@kloudopp.com using "Social Media Manager Application" as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply

Customer Service Officer Job at Nelson Courier Express




        
    

        
        Nelson Courier Express is a dispatch delivery company located in Lagos license for both local and international delivery.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Customer Service Officer

Job Locations: Uyo - Akwa Ibom, Borno and Ondo
Employment Type: Full-time

Requirements
     

            
    




	The right candidate must have worked as a customer service officer in a reputable company
	The right candidate must have customers service relationship characters
	The right candidate must be smart and efficient and must have accounting experience
	The right candidate must understand uyo metropolitans very well
	He/she must be a person of good character
	He/she must live in Uyo
	The right candidate must be ready to start work immediately.


Salary
N50,000 monthly.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and application to: nelsoncourierandtransport@gmail.com using the Job Positionas the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Senior Developer",
  "description": "TopHire Africa is a timeless and innovative HR-Consulting Service provider that&#39;s geared towards delivering recruitment and training of qualitatively verified talent.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Senior Developer&nbsp;

Job Location:&nbsp;Abuja (FCT)&nbsp;
Employment Type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities
Network Design and Implementation:


	Design and implement robust and scalable network solutions to meet business requirements.
	Evaluate and select appropriate network hardware and software.


Network Management:


	Monitor network performance, troubleshoot issues, and optimize network&nbsp;efficiency.
	Configure and maintain routers, switches, firewalls, and other network devices.


Security and Compliance:


	Implement network security protocols and ensure compliance with industry standards.
	Conduct risk assessments and vulnerability assessments to identify potential security threats.


Documentation and Reporting:


	Maintain comprehensive documentation of network configurations, policies, and procedures.
	Prepare reports on network performance and incident responses for management review.


Collaboration and Support:


	Work closely with cross-functional teams to support network-related projects.
	Provide technical support and mentorship to junior engineers and other IT staff.


Research and Development:


	Stay up-to-date with emerging technologies and industry trends.
	Evaluate new tools and technologies to enhance network performance and security.


Salary
N1,000,000 - N1,500,000 / month.

Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Applications to:&nbsp;tophireafrica@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.",

  "validThrough": "2026-03-01",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",
  "hiringOrganization": {
    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "TopHire Africa"
    
  },
  "jobLocation": {
    "@type": "Place",
    "address": {
      "@type": "PostalAddress",
       "postalCode": ". ",
       "addressRegion": ". ",
       "streetAddress": ". ",

      "addressCountry": "NG"

  },

    "value": {

    }
  }
}



Senior Developer Job at TopHire Africa




        
    

        
        TopHire Africa is a timeless and innovative HR-Consulting Service provider that's geared towards delivering recruitment and training of qualitatively verified talent.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Senior Developer 

Job Location: Abuja (FCT) 
Employment Type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities
Network Design and Implementation:


	Design and implement robust and scalable network solutions to meet business requirements.
	Evaluate and select appropriate network hardware and software.


Network Management:
     

            
    




	Monitor network performance, troubleshoot issues, and optimize network efficiency.
	Configure and maintain routers, switches, firewalls, and other network devices.


Security and Compliance:


	Implement network security protocols and ensure compliance with industry standards.
	Conduct risk assessments and vulnerability assessments to identify potential security threats.


Documentation and Reporting:


	Maintain comprehensive documentation of network configurations, policies, and procedures.
	Prepare reports on network performance and incident responses for management review.


Collaboration and Support:


	Work closely with cross-functional teams to support network-related projects.
	Provide technical support and mentorship to junior engineers and other IT staff.


Research and Development:


	Stay up-to-date with emerging technologies and industry trends.
	Evaluate new tools and technologies to enhance network performance and security.


Salary
N1,000,000 - N1,500,000 / month.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Applications to: tophireafrica@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Secretary",
  "description": "Hec Recruit is a full-service HR consulting firm with a unique approach. Since 2020 we have been helping our clients find a job best suited for their skills and interests, and helping local companies locate the best employees.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Secretary

Job Location:&nbsp;Abraham Adesanya, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Working days: Mondays to Thursdays

Job Description


	We&#39;re looking for a skilled Secretary to join our team! You&#39;ll provide administrative support, manage schedules, and contribute to sales growth.


Responsibilities


	Manage executive schedules and calendars
	Prepare and edit documents, reports, and presentations
	Coordinate meetings and events
	Handle confidential information with discretion
	Support sales team with administrative tasks.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess a Bachelor&#39;s Degree with a minimum 2 years of secretarial experience
	Excellent organizational and communication skills
	Proficient in MS Office and Google Suite
	Strong attention to detail.


Salary and Benefits


	N100,000 - N150,000 / Month.
	HMO coverage
	Commission on sales
	Performance-based incentives
	Career growth opportunities
	Training and development programs


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;hecrecruitment.hrconsulting@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

  },

Secretary Job at Hec Recruit




        
    

        
        Hec Recruit is a full-service HR consulting firm with a unique approach. Since 2020 we have been helping our clients find a job best suited for their skills and interests, and helping local companies locate the best employees.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Secretary

Job Location: Abraham Adesanya, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Working days: Mondays to Thursdays

Job Description


	We're looking for a skilled Secretary to join our team! You'll provide administrative support, manage schedules, and contribute to sales growth.


Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Manage executive schedules and calendars
	Prepare and edit documents, reports, and presentations
	Coordinate meetings and events
	Handle confidential information with discretion
	Support sales team with administrative tasks.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess a Bachelor's Degree with a minimum 2 years of secretarial experience
	Excellent organizational and communication skills
	Proficient in MS Office and Google Suite
	Strong attention to detail.


Salary and Benefits


	N100,000 - N150,000 / Month.
	HMO coverage
	Commission on sales
	Performance-based incentives
	Career growth opportunities
	Training and development programs


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hecrecruitment.hrconsulting@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply
